entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 29.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
